pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 夕食の後、私たちはみんな応接室に行った。
lessons.english: After dinner, we all went into the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 数人の客が応接室で待っていた。
lessons.english: There were some guests waiting in the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 私は応接間に案内された。
lessons.english: I was ushered into the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 今この応接間に入ってはいけません。
lessons.english: Don't go into this drawing room now.

lessons.japanese: 今この応接間に入ってはいけません。
lessons.english: Don't go into this drawing room now.

lessons.japanese: 私は応接間に案内された。
lessons.english: I was ushered into the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 応接室に通されました。
lessons.english: I was ushered into the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 数人の客が応接室で待っていた。
lessons.english: There were some guests waiting in the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 夕食の後、私たちはみんな応接室に行った。
lessons.english: After dinner, we all went into the drawing room.

lessons.japanese: 応接間は今日、リビングルームと言われている。
lessons.english: A drawing room is now called a living room.

lessons.japanese: 応接間は今日、リビングルームと言われている。
lessons.english: A drawing room is now called a living room.

lessons.japanese: 応接室に通されました。
lessons.english: I was ushered into the drawing room.
